StephenKingRevelation: ^Stephen King: Ah that wasn't so bad.
^Stephen King: It wasn't anything I didn't aleady know.
^You: Do you feel changed or different?
^Stephen King: My essence feels slightly more whole.
^Stephen King: My sense of childlike wonder is now revitalized and I feel at one with my true self. Maybe I'll try writing a play.
^Stephen King: I guess we'll find out.
